 If you want to intelligently debate religious affairs, then welcome. And I'm sure you will find many here willing to oblige. If you are using this as an outlet for preaching and venting holy wrath at us heathens, well I've seen enough other posters come and go on these forums, and I'm sure you won't be the last.
